item.title: [one] Annihilating Glare
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {4} or sacrifice an artifact or creature.

Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

item.title: [one] Cruel Grimnarch
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Cleric

Deathtouch

When Cruel Grimnarch enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card. For each opponent who can't, you gain 4 life.

item.title: [one] Cutthroat Centurion
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Warrior

Sacrifice another artifact or creature: Cutthroat Centurion gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

item.title: [one] Gulping Scraptrap
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Horror

When Gulping Scraptrap enters the battlefield or dies, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [one] Offer Immortality
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

item.title: [one] Infectious Inquiry
item.description:
Sorcery

You draw two cards and you lose 2 life. Each opponent gets a poison counter.

item.title: [one] Sheoldred's Headcleaver
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Warrior

Menace

Toxic 2 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also gets two poison counter.)

item.title: [one] Testament Bearer
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Warrior

When Testament Bearer dies, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

item.title: [one] Whisper of the Dross
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [one] Axiom Engraver
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Wizard

Axiom Engraver enters the battlefield with two oil counters on it.

{T}, Remove an oil counter from Axiom Engraver, Discard a card: Draw a card.

item.title: [one] Barbed Batterfist
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

For Mirrodin! (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 red Rebel creature token, then attach this to it.)

Equipped creature gets +1/-1.

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [one] Bladegraft Aspirant
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Warrior

Menace

Equipment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

Activated abilities of Equipment you control that target Bladegraft Aspirant cost {1} less to activate.

item.title: [one] Blazing Crescendo
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.

Exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

item.title: [one] Chimney Rabble
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Goblin Warrior

Haste

When Chimney Rabble enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 red Phyrexian Goblin creature token.

item.title: [one] Forgehammer Centurion
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Warrior

Whenever another creature or artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put an oil counter on Forgehammer Centurion.

Whenever Forgehammer Centurion attacks, you may remove two oil counters from it. When you do, target creature can't block this turn.

item.title: [one] Furnace Strider
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Beast

Furnace Strider enters the battlefield with two oil counters on it.

Remove an oil counter from Furnace Strider: Target creature you control gains haste until end of turn.

item.title: [one] Hazardous Blast
item.description:
Sorcery

Hazardous Blast deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Creatures your opponents control can't block this turn.

item.title: [one] Kuldotha Cackler
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Hyena

Trample

Whenever Kuldotha Cackler attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of permanents you control with oil counters on them.

item.title: [one] Molten Rebuke
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one or both—

• Molten Rebuke deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

• Destroy target Equipment.

item.title: [one] Shrapnel Slinger
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Beast

When Shrapnel Slinger enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature. When you do, destroy target artifact an opponent controls.

item.title: [one] Thrill of Possibility
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.

Draw two cards.

item.title: [one] Adaptive Sporesinger
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Druid

Vigilance

When Adaptive Sporesinger enters the battlefield, choose one—

• Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains vigilance until end of turn.

• Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [one] Contagious Vorrac
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Boar Beast

When Contagious Vorrac enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a land card from among them and put it in your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. If you didn't put a card into your hand this way, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [one] Copper Longlegs
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Spider

Reach

{1}{G}, Sacrifice Copper Longlegs: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [one] Ichorspit Basilisk
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Basilisk

Deathtouch

Toxic 1 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get a poison counter.)

item.title: [one] Lattice-Blade Mantis
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Insect

Lattice-Blade Mantis enters the battlefield with two oil counters on it.

Whenever Lattice-Blade Mantis attacks, you may remove an oil counter from it. If you do, untap it and it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [one] Maze's Mantle
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Flash

Enchant creature

When Maze's Mantle enters the battlefield, if enchanted creature has toxic, that creature gains hexproof until end of turn.

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

item.title: [one] Oil-Gorger Troll
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Troll Warrior

When Oil-Gorger Troll enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. Then if you control a permanent with an oil counter on it, draw a card.

item.title: [one] Predation Steward
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Elf Warrior

Predation Steward enters the battlefield with two oil counters on it.

{2}{G}, {T}, Remove an oil counter from Predation Steward: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [one] Ruthless Predation
item.description:
Sorcery

Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

item.title: [one] Skyscythe Engulfer
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Beast

Reach, trample

Skyscythe Engulfer can't be blocked by creatures with flying.

item.title: [one] Thirsting Roots
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one—

• Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

• Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [one] Titanic Growth
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

item.title: [one] Serum-Core Chimera
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Chimera

Flying

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put an oil counter on Serum-Core Chimera.

Remove three oil counters from Serum-Core Chimera: Draw a card. Then you may discard a nonland card. When you discard a card this way, Serum-Core Chimera deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [one] Vivisection Evangelist
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Cleric

Vigilance

Corrupted — When Vivisection Evangelist enters the battlefield, if an opponent has three or more poison counters, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.

item.title: [one] Myr Custodian
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Myr

When Myr Custodian enters the battlefield, scry 2. Then each opponent may scry 1. (To scry X, that player looks at the top X cards of their library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

item.title: [one] Myr Kinsmith
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Myr

When Myr Kinsmith enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Myr card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [one] Prophetic Prism
item.description:
Artifact

When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card.

{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [one] Terramorphic Expanse
item.description:
Land

{T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [one] Darkslick Shores
item.description:
Land

Darkslick Shores enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.

{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

item.title: [one] Hexgold Hoverwings
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

For Mirrodin! (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 red Rebel creature token, then attach this to it.)

Equipped creature has flying.

Creatures you control that are equipped get +1/+0.

Equip {2}{W}

item.title: [one] Solphim, Mayhem Dominus
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Horror

If a source you control would deal noncombat damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, it deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead.

{1}{R/P}{R/P}, Discard two cards: Put an indestructible counter on Solphim, Mayhem Dominus.

item.title: [one] Migloz, Maze Crusher
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Beast

Migloz, Maze Crusher enters the battlefield with five oil counters on it.

{1}, Remove an oil counter from Migloz: It gains vigilance and menace until end of turn.

{2}, Remove two oil counters from Migloz: It gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

{3}, Remove three oil counters from Migloz: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [one] Distorted Curiosity
item.description:
Sorcery

Corrupted — This spell costs {2} less to cast if an opponent has three or more poison counters.

Draw two cards.

https://twitter.com/covertgoblue/status/1618267693366521863

item.title: [one] Sopandrel, Hunger Dominus
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Reach

At the beginning of each combat, double the power and toughness of each creature you control until end of turn.

{G/P}{G/P}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Put an indestructible counter on Sopandrel, Hunger Dominus. ({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)

item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Bat

Flying

Toxic 1 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get a poison counter.)

When you proliferate, return Voidwing Hybrid from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [one] Font of Progress
item.description:
Artifact

Font of Progress enters the battlefield with two oil counters on it.

{3}, {T}: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of oil counters on Font of Progress.
